recipesJson.name: Snake Pit
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: Needs a 10-day steep for the coconuts and cream to combine and to reduce throat hit.

reviews.text: I can always count on ID10-T to master the snake series of flavors, and this is an absolute must try. Every element melds together beautifully to create a very well balanced vape. I made mine at 70VG with a 14 day steep.
